div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 771 Constanta (anc. Tomis), Rumania, 1938-1942 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 30-40 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia Pontica: diob. Mesembria: diob. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) Moisil, Cabinetul numismatic 1938-42, p. 5, nos. 40,42
